title: [Economics] The U.K. would have saved about 65,000 lives and had its GDP fall by just 0.5% rather than 11% in 2020 if it had adopted strict South Korean-style coronavirus controls, researchers have found, showing that there is not necessarily a tradeoff between the economy and public health
[Health] Abstaining from alcohol is as important in fighting COVID as washing hands, according to a Swedish research report
